net.varkhan.base.conversion.serializer
Interface Serializer<T,C>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of objects that can be transcoded
C - the type of the serialization context
All Superinterfaces:
Decoder<T,C>, Encoder<T,C>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArraySerializer, BooleanArraySerializer, BooleanSerializer, ByteArraySerializer, ByteSerializer, CharArraySerializer, DoubleArraySerializer, DoubleSerializer, FloatArraySerializer, FloatSerializer, IntArraySerializer, IntSerializer, LongArraySerializer, LongSerializer, MapSerializer, NullSerializer, RecordSerializer, ReferenceSerializer, ReflectSerializer, ShortArraySerializer, ShortSerializer, StringSerializer, StructSerializer, UnionSerializer, VariadicSerializer
public interface Serializer<T,C>
extends Decoder<T,C>, Encoder<T,C>

A serialization transcoder.
